title: Letters on several subjects with several other letters : to which is added by the publisher two letters, one to the Reverend Dr. Sherlock, Dean of St. Paul's, and the other to the Reverend Mr. Bentley : with other discourses / by Henry More ; publish'd by E. Elys.
author: More, Henry, 1614-1687.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by W. Onely for John Everingham,
